After seeing growth and having a large growth of customers, they soon targeted gamers with their gaming peripherals. t: The unknown budget gaming brand - Bloody - gaming mouse & kb review
s: December 26, 2021 - Yet, as for the budget gaming keyboards and mice, A4Tech/Bloody offers a great combination of looks, features, quality and price.
